# Toronto EEB Student Journal Club

This webpage hosts information about the UofT EEB student journal club and seminar! Students, postdocs, and faculty are welcome. We meet to discuss papers in ecology and evolution, and have students practice presentations on their research for upcoming conferences, committee meetings, etc.

## Fall 2023

Fridays 11:10am ESC 1014 and [on Zoom!](https://utoronto.zoom.us/j/88434544627)
